```bash
#!/bin/bash

function calculate_tax {
    local income=$1
    if (( income < 10000 )); then
        echo $(bc <<< "scale=2; $income * 0.1")
    elif (( income < 50000 )); then
        echo $(bc <<< "scale=2; $income * 0.2")
    elif (( income < 100000 )); then
        echo $(bc <<< "scale=2; $income * 0.3")
    else
        echo $(bc <<< "scale=2; $income * 0.5") # Corrected for income >= 100000
    fi
}

tax=$(calculate_tax 150000)
if [[ $tax == "None" ]]; then
    echo "No default case for income tax calculation."
else
    echo "Tax is: $tax"
fi
```

Summary.gemini-2.0-flash:
```bash
#!/bin/bash

calculate_tax() {
  income=$1

  if (( income <= 20000 )); then
    tax_rate=0.10
  elif (( income > 20000 && income <= 50000 )); then
    tax_rate=0.20
  elif (( income > 50000 && income <= 100000 )); then
    tax_rate=0.30
  elif (( income > 100000 )); then
    tax_rate=0.40
  else
    echo "No default case for income tax calculation for this income bracket."
    return 1
  fi

  tax_amount=$(echo "scale=2; $income * $tax_rate" | bc)

  echo "Income: $income"
  echo "Tax Rate: $(echo "scale=2; $tax_rate * 100" | bc)%"
  echo "Tax Amount: \$$tax_amount"
}

income=150000

calculate_tax $income
```

```bash
#!/bin/bash

calculate_tax() {
  local income=$1
  local tax

  if [[ $(echo "$income < 10000" | bc) -eq 1 ]]; then
    tax=$(echo "scale=2; $income * 0.10" | bc)
  elif [[ $(echo "$income >= 10000 && $income < 50000" | bc) -eq 1 ]]; then
    tax=$(echo "scale=2; $income * 0.20" | bc)
  elif [[ $(echo "$income >= 50000 && $income < 100000" | bc) -eq 1 ]]; then
    tax=$(echo "scale=2; $income * 0.30" | bc)
  else
    tax="None"
  fi

  echo "$tax"
}

tax=$(calculate_tax 150000)

if [[ "$tax" == "None" ]]; then
  echo "No default case for income tax calculation."
fi
```
